Articles.Content: I think they should add a new game mode called creator or god mode. This would be exactly like sandbox mode ship wise, but you could also start it out by having just Kerbin and Kerbol, and then creating your own planets, and choosing where premade ones go. This would be fun I think.
You mean making new planets in game?  It's a good idea, but sadly a bit of an unrealistic one.  That would be a massive undertaking and in all likelihood would be an entirely new game.
